mapper.select: SELECT app.id,app.sid specificationId,app.title,par.name appProduct,app.industry_id industryId,app.market_id marketId, app.select_requirements selectRequirements,app.select_cause selectCause,app.setting,app.photo,app.create_time createTime,par2.name terminal FROM zl_application_case app LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter par ON par.id = app.app_product_id AND par.class_type = 9 LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter par2 ON par2.id = app.terminal_id AND par2.class_type = 8 WHERE app.del = 1 AND app.examine = 1
